newsList.lead: Su-35S aircraft of the Aerospace Forces provided fighter support for the flight

newsList.title: Israel used white phosphorus in south Lebanon again, Al Wataniya says
newsList.lead: The attacks resulted in casualties, but their number has not been disclosed

newsList.title: FSB nabs Crimean resident for collaborating with Ukraine’s intelligence
newsList.lead: On an assignment from Ukraine’s intelligence, the suspect was engaged in creating ammunition caches on the territory of Crimea

newsList.title: Russia’s defense chief chairs meeting to discuss increasing howitzer, MLRS production
newsList.lead: Sergey Shoigu urged efforts to shorten delivery times to troops

newsList.title: Russia says its bombers struck two Ukrainian command posts in Donetsk republic
newsList.lead: The spokesman Alexander Savchuk also said that counterbattery operations helped detect and suppress about 30 artillery units of the enemy

newsList.title: Russia says its forces foiled six Ukrainian attacks in Krasny Liman area
newsList.lead: The battlegroup’s spokesman Alexander Savchuk also said that Ukraine lost about 60 servicemen
